title: Dr. Grom's Ambassador-Workbench
content:
This is the workbench of [[*user Dr. Grom]], Admin of the [http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/ German branch] and [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/ the International Translation Archive].

[[tabview]]
[[tab Notes]]
These automated lists are meant to keep track of pages and categories that might be interesting from a technical point of view but usually not for normal users.

Some tabs may be pretty slow and take some time to load.
[[/tab]]

[[tab Tag-cloud]]
This tag-cloud shows every used tag, including hidden tags.
[[module TagCloud limit="1000" target="system:page-tags" showHidden="yes"]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Changes in special categories]]
Recently changed pages all categories but "_default", "fragment" and "log-of-unexplained-locations".

[[module ListPages category="* -_default -fragment" separate="no" order="updated_at desc" pagetype="*" perPage="40"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%updated_at%% || %%updated_by_linked%%||
[[/module]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Changes in special pages]]
Recently changed pages with the tags "admin", "guide", "theme" and "template" in the categories "_default", "fragment" and "log-of-unexplained-locations".

[[module ListPages tags="admin guide theme template" separate="no" order="updated_at desc" pagetype="*" category="_default fragment log-of-unexplained-locations" perPage="40"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%updated_at%% || %%updated_by_linked%%||
[[/module]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab List of Categories]]
[[module Categories includehidden="true"]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Hidden pages]]
[[module ListPages category="*" separate="no" order="title" pagetype="hidden"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || [[user %%created_by%%]] || %%created_at%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Alphabetical Members list]]
[[module Members order="name"]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab International articles]]
[[module ListPages category="*" separate="no" order="title" pagetype="*" tags="international" perPage="40" prependLine="||~ Article ||~ Rating ||~ Votes ||~ Comments ||~ Last editor||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%rating%% || %%rating_votes%% || %%comments%% || %%updated_by_linked%%||
[[/module]]
[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
author: Dr_Grom
